blogPost.excerpt: 📈 How do top startups find their early customers? Find out on First 1000. We share a case study every week about how companies like Zapier, Doordash and Tinder got their very first customers.
blogPost.body: 📈 How do top startups find their early customers? Find out on First 1000. We share a case study every week about how companies like Zapier, Doordash and Tinder got their very first customers.
blogPost.title: First 1000 - Case studies on how companies got their first 1000 customers
blogPost.author: Ali AbouelAtta

localize.description: 📈顶级创业公司如何找到他们的早期客户？在First 1000上找到答案。我们每周都会分享一个案例研究，介绍Zapier、Doordash和Tinder等公司如何获得他们的第一批客户。
localize.tagline: 企业如何获得第一个1000个客户的案例研究

localize.description: 📈頂級創業公司如何找到他們的早期客戶？在First 1000上找到答案。我們每週都會分享一個案例研究，介紹Zapier、Doordash和Tinder等公司如何獲得他們的第一批客戶。
localize.tagline: 企業如何獲得第一個1000個客戶的案例研究

previous.excerpt: Sonos’s smartest and most versatile speaker sounds incredible for its size, is effortless to set up and control, and packs new innovation into a premium, lightweight, and durable design.
previous.title: Sonos Roam - A portable, waterproof speaker from Sonos

localize.description: Sonos 最聪明、功能最全面的扬声器，以其尺寸而言，听起来令人难以置信，设置和控制起来毫不费力，并在优质、轻巧、耐用的设计中融入新的创新。
localize.tagline: 来自Sonos的便携式防水扬声器

localize.description: Sonos 最聰明、功能最全面的揚聲器，以其尺寸而言，聽起來令人難以置信，設置和控制起來毫不費力，並在優質、輕巧、耐用的設計中融入新的創新。
localize.tagline: 來自Sonos的便攜式防水揚聲器

next.excerpt: Happy Things is here to help you live a happier life! With hundreds of small, diverse daily activities, the mobile app guides and motivates you to do one thing each day to boost your happiness.
next.title: Happy Things - Simple, daily activities to increase your happiness

localize.description: Happy Things是来帮助你过上更快乐的生活的! 这款手机应用通过上百种多样的日常小活动，引导和激励你每天做一件事，提升你的幸福感。
localize.tagline: 简单的日常活动，增加你的幸福感

localize.description: Happy Things是來幫助你過上更快樂的生活的! 這款手機應用通過上百種多樣的日常小活動，引導和激勵你每天做一件事，提升你的幸福感。
localize.tagline: 簡單的日常活動，增加你的幸福感
